title.rendered: TTE FM out for a team bonding event

content.rendered: To celebrate our success of 2023 and set the tone for our 2024 strategy; TTE Facilities Management organized an exclusive desert safari where the team building and fun began on the bus journey then hitting the desert sands for some thrilling dune bashing, camel rides, live entertainment, and a lavish dinner. Dilip Sharma, EVP and Marc Daly MCIPS, CPPM, CPP, VP awarded star performers from all functions in the business and then partook in engaging team-building activities including a “Thank You” session when each team member wrote thank you cards to their work family.
